hero.title: Game Hosting

features.title: Built for
features.description: Enterprise-grade infrastructure with gamer-friendly tooling. Instant servers, low-latency routing, and powerful controls.

ddos.title: DDoS Protection
ddos.description: Enterprise-grade mitigation and automatic scrubbing to keep servers online under attack.

latency.title: Low Latency Network
latency.description: Optimized routes, private backbone links, and regional POPs for minimal ping.

setup.title: Instant Setup
setup.description: One-click server templates, automated mod installs, and fast provisioning.

locations.title: Global Locations
locations.description: Multiple regions and edge POPs to keep players close and latency low.

panel.title: Control Panel
panel.description: A powerful UI for console access, file management, backups, and metrics.

support.title: 24/7 Support
support.description: Human-first support with expert ops available any time, for installs and troubleshooting.

about.title: Built by Gamers,
about.paragraph1: NodeByte started as a small group of gamers and ops engineers who wanted hosting that was fast, reliable, and easy to manage. We've experienced the frustration of laggy servers and unresponsive support firsthand.
about.paragraph2: That's why we built infrastructure tuned specifically for multiplayer gaming: low latency routing, robust DDoS protection, and instant server provisioning so you can get playing fast.

players.title: Built for Players
players.description: Our infrastructure prioritizes low latency routing, predictable performance, and strong uptime so your communities stay online and responsive.

community.title: Community & Mod Support
community.description: Seamless mod installs, snapshot support, and community tooling to help you run modded worlds and persistent servers with minimal effort.

open.title: Open by Design
open.description: We value transparency from clear SLA commitments to open tooling. Our platform provides APIs and integrations to automate server workflows.

pricing.title: Server Plans
pricing.description: Flexible plans to match your needs. All plans include DDoS protection, instant setup, and 24/7 support.
pricing.comingSoonDescription: We're working on bringing you the best hosting experience. Join our Discord to be notified when we launch!
pricing.customSolution: Need a custom solution or have questions?

faq.title: Frequently Asked
faq.description: Quick answers about NodeByte hosting, performance, and support.
faq.noResults: No results found. Try searching for "DDoS", "mods", or "SLA".
faq.cantFind: Can't find what you're looking for? Our support team is here to help.

provision.question: How fast can I provision a server?
provision.answer: Most prebuilt server templates provision in under 60 seconds. Custom setups with large mods may take longer depending on mod install time.

ddos.question: Do you offer DDoS protection?
ddos.answer: Yes, all plans include automated DDoS mitigation at the network edge. For large or targeted attacks we provide additional scrubbing services on higher tiers.

locations.question: Where are your data centers located?
locations.answer: We operate multiple data centers across the UK with EU expansion planned. Check our coverage map or contact sales for custom regions.

mods.question: Can I run mods and custom maps?
mods.answer: Yes, our control panel and templates support common mod loaders (Forge, Fabric) and custom map uploads. Managed mod support is available on selected plans.

uptime.question: What is your uptime SLA?
uptime.answer: We offer a 99.6% uptime SLA on production plans. See our terms for details and eligibility criteria.

trial.question: Can I get a trial before committing?
trial.answer: Yes, we offer a 7-day trial period for new users to test our services before making a commitment. Contact our support team to get started.

games.title: Choose Your
games.description: Powerful, low-latency game servers. Instant setup, intuitive control panel, and 24/7 expert support.
games.customSolution: Need a game server that's not listed?

minecraft.description: Java & Bedrock servers with one click mod loaders, plugins, and full version support.

rust.description: High-performance Rust server hosting with Oxide/uMod support and custom map options.

hytale.description: Hytale server hosting coming soon! Join our Discord to get early access and updates.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: We're here to help 24/7. Reach out through any of our support channels and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.

warning.title: Important Notice
warning.description: We do not handle billing or account-related support via Discord. For privacy and security, please contact us at support@nodebyte.host for sensitive matters.

footer.tagline: Fast, reliable, scalable and secure hosting services for your gaming experience. Built for Humans. Powered by Bytes.
